game.name: Shooter Accuracy and Speed
game.description:
Your wait for something highly engaging and addictive game is over. Today we have brought to you a brand new action packed puzzle which will surely take you to a never ending fun platform. Join Shooter Accuracy and Speed game and know why gamers of all ages have today become so much crazy about it! It will not be easy to defeat your enemies and ensure your win. Get ready to put your quick reflexes and shooting ability to test to the maximum to achieve your goal! 
In this cool shooting game, you will find yourself surrounded by a horde of enemies. Enter this battlefield, shoot all armies and capture the area in a hero style! Every successful shoot will help you get some points. Try to hit as many armies as possible to score bigger in this time-based html5 shooter challenge! Remember you will be out of the game if you lose your health or run out of bullet. 
These armies are very dangerous and available in a great number. So, they keep coming out from their hidden base again and again. Aim your target using the mouse and shoot them with LMB to secure your points in this point and click game! No worries if you do not find this action game quite interesting. The availability of many free battle games on atmegame will make it find the other suitable fun options. Give us a try to seek for extra thrill and entertainment!!
